ProjectTitle: Taking Control? Administrative Capacity-building in the European Parliament

2. Data description
Do you also transcribe interviews? Then include that here too.
3. Legal - ethical
Please include your PRET approval number, as Privacy Registry Reference
Also your online survey will likely contain personal data (IP or email)
6. Preservation
If interviews are transcribed, then there's no need to keep recordings for 10 year. It's best to then destroy those (minimisation of personal data to keep)
7. Data sharing
Consider KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
